thread.title: Thaman on a roll
thread.title_full: Thaman on a roll - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Thaman on a roll
text: Young composer SS Thaman is one of the leading music directors down South. In a career spanning over 7 years, he bagged many hit albums and is well known for his peppy and hard-rock numbers. His latest album Bruce Lee will be unveiled tomorrow. All the music lovers have been eagerly waiting for the album and the foot-tapping tunes in the making videos and the trailers have increased the expectations on the album. It is heard that Thaman is coming up with yet another energetic and lively album.
